game.name: Train Simulator: DB ICE 1 EMU Add-On
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, Steam Cloud, Steam 순위표, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: The ICE 1 is a ground-breaking German high-speed train which delivers real performance for drivers around the world in Train Simulator.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The ICE 1 is a ground-breaking German high-speed train which delivers real performance for drivers around the world in Train Simulator.
